articles.description: Manchester City will be looking at the likes of Erling Haaland and Lionel Messi to add “X-factor” to their squad, says Claus Lundekvam, with a former Norway international of the opinion that a fellow countryman is what the Blues need in upcoming windows.

articles.author: Sporting News
articles.title: 'We're not a Liverpool of last year' - Lampard issues Chelsea reality check after form slump - Goal.com
articles.description: Manchester City will be looking at the likes of Erling Haaland and Lionel Messi to add “X-factor” to their squad, says Claus Lundekvam, with a former Norway international of the opinion that a fellow countryman is what the Blues need in upcoming windows.

articles.title: Messi matches Pele record as Barcelona, Valencia share the spoils - The World Game
articles.description: Lionel Messi equalled Pele's one-club goals record but it was not enough for Barcelona as they were held to a 2-2 draw by Valencia's in Sunday's (AEDT) entertaining La Liga clash.
articles.content:
The superstar forward notched his 643rd goal for the Catalan giants on the brink of half-time, scoring in the aftermath of having a penalty saved by Jaume Domenech.
That milestone goal cancelled out… [+1966 chars]
